item.title: Democracy Player 0.9.6.1
item.sparkle:releaseNotesLink:
Minor Update to Democracy Player

Version 0.9.6.1 is a bug fix release recommended for all windows users.

  • Fixes a security flaw in VLC on Windows.
  • Fixes the annoying volume slider behavior on Windows.
  • Improves playback on Windows Vista (turns off 'compatibility mode', which is no longer needed).
